Title: Automatic named constructor discovery
Description: The issue arises when upgrading from `cuyz/valinor:0.3.0` to a newer system on an existing application, which broke due to the wrong constructor being picked. The bigger security concern is akin to https://github.com/rails/rails/issues/5228.
NotImpacted: All versions before 0.5.0, all versions starting from 0.7.0
